General.Name: New Gold Inc
General.Description: New Gold Inc., an intermediate gold mining company, engages in the development and operation of mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for gold, silver, and copper deposits. The company's principal operating properties include 100% interest in the Rainy River mine located in Northwestern Ontario, Canada; and New Afton project situated in South-Central British Columbia. New Gold Inc. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: Brookfield Place, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2T3
